title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1963.7 - Variance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1963.7 - Variance

State Regulations

Any of the rules set forth herein may be
varied in the discretion of the court for good cause shown. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
1963.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
